title: "DHL orders 100 self-driving trucks from TuSimple"
excerpt: "In a new agreement, TuSimple will adopt, integrate and scale its Level 4 autonomous technology into logistics giant DHL’s operations. DHL began using TuSimple’s technology in daily freight haul operations from San Antonio to Dallas in early December and the extension of the partnership will see DHL reserving 100 autonomous trucks to be co-developed by TuSimple and Navistar in the U."
